languages.text: {n}Воин смотрит на вас с легким удивлением, а затем с понимаем криво ухмыляется и загадочно изрекает:{/n} "Хищник ест не только, когда голоден. Причины бывают разные".
{n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин смотрит на вас с легким удивлением, а затем с понимаем криво ухмыляется и загадочно изрекает:{/n} "Хищник ест не только, когда голоден. Причины бывают разные".

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这位战士略带惊讶地看着你，随后明白了你的意思，脸上露出了狡黠的笑容。{/n}“掠食者并不会只有在饿了的时候才会进食，进食也有许多不同的原因。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位战士略带惊讶地看着你，随后明白了你的意思，脸上露出了狡黠的笑容。{/n}“掠食者并不会只有在饿了的时候才会进食，进食也有许多不同的原因。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}戦士は軽い驚きの表情を浮かべ、理解したかのように歪んだ笑顔を見せた。{/n}「捕食者は腹が減っていなくても食うものだ。食うという行為にはいろんな意味がある」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士は軽い驚きの表情を浮かべ、理解したかのように歪んだ笑顔を見せた。{/n}「捕食者は腹が減っていなくても食うものだ。食うという行為にはいろんな意味がある」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El guerrero te mira con leve sorpresa, aunque luego la comprensión le hace sonreír.{/n} «Un depredador no solo come cuando tiene hambre. Hay numerosas razones para comer».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero te mira con leve sorpresa, aunque luego la comprensión le hace sonreír.{/n} «Un depredador no solo come cuando tiene hambre. Hay numerosas razones para comer».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier vous lance un regard légèrement surpris, puis un rictus apparaît sur son visage une fois qu'il comprend ce que vous voulez dire.{/n} « Un prédateur ne se contente pas de satisfaire sa faim. Il a bien des raisons de manger. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier vous lance un regard légèrement surpris, puis un rictus apparaît sur son visage une fois qu'il comprend ce que vous voulez dire.{/n} « Un prédateur ne se contente pas de satisfaire sa faim. Il a bien des raisons de manger. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger sieht dich leicht überrascht an, versteht dann und grinst verschmitzt.{/n} "Ein Raubtier frisst nicht nur, wenn es Hunger hat. Es gibt viele Gründe, um zu essen."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieger sieht dich leicht überrascht an, versteht dann und grinst verschmitzt.{/n} "Ein Raubtier frisst nicht nur, wenn es Hunger hat. Es gibt viele Gründe, um zu essen."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."

languages.text: {n}Savaşçı, hafif bir şaşkınlıkla sana bakıyor. Duyduğunu kavramasıyla birlikte yüzüne sahte bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n} "Bir avcı, yalnızca aç kaldığında yemez. Yemek için pek çok neden vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior looks at you in mild surprise, then understanding brings a crooked grin to his face.{/n} "A predator does not eat only when it is hungry. There are many reasons to eat."
